text: Hideki Chiba (born October 25, 1983) is a former baseball player based in Japan.https://www.baseball-reference.com/register/player.cgi?id=chiba-001hid He played for the Yokohama Bay Stars in the Central League during the 2002 season, posting a 3.38 ERA in eight innings pitched. ==References== Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese baseball players Category:Nippon Professional Baseball pitchers Category:Yokohama BayStars players Category:People from Hachiōji, Tokyo
title: Hideki Chiba
